struct.name: AntInteraction
struct.brief: Defines an interaction between two Ants

field.name: IDs
field.brief: The IDs of the two fort::myrmidon::Ant.
field.doc: The ID of the two fort::myrmidon::Ant. Always reports `IDs.first < IDs.second`.

field.name: Types
field.brief: Virtual shape body part that were in contact.
field.doc: Virtual shape body part that were in contact during the interaction.

field.name: Trajectories
field.brief: Reports the fort::myrmidon::AntTrajectory of each Ant.
field.doc: Reports the fort::myrmidon::AntTrajectory of each Ant during the interaction. The Trajectory are truncated to the interaction timing.

field.name: Start
field.brief: Reports the fort::myrmidon::Time the interaction starts

field.name: End
field.brief: Reports the fort::myrmidon::Time the interaction ends

field.name: Space
field.brief: Reports the fort::myrmidon::SpaceID where the interaction happend

typedef.name: ConstPtr
typedef.brief: A pointer to the interaction structure
